text: Prelude to the Afternoon of a Faun () is a work for orchestra by Claude Debussy. It was inspired by a poem by St√©phane Mallarme. It was first performed on 22 December 1894 in Paris. The music was used for a ballet in 1912 designed by Vaslav Nijinsky. Afternoon of a Faun Afternoon of a Faun Category:Compositions in E major
title: The Afternoon of a Faun
